title: Natural Remedies for Dog Illnesses and Dog Training
headline: This free online course shows you how to use natural remedies to treat your dog's illnesses and unwanted behaviours.
description: Discover the information you need to naturally treat common complaints in dogs such as diarrhoea, skin conditions, ear infections and joint problems. You'll discover which herbs, homoeopathic remedies, aromatherapy oils and Bach Flowers have miraculous healing effects on dogs as well as what natural remedies are great to use for resolving common unwanted dog behaviours.
courseDescription:
This natural remedies course for dog illnesses and training is for those wanting to successfully treat and heal their dog's ailments with natural remedies rather than antibiotics or medication with potentially nasty side effects. It is also for people who have a dog with recurring illnesses or those concerned about their dog's health and vitality. Some of the conditions covered are diarrhoea, skin conditions, ear infections, joint problems and other stubborn disorders. Explore all-natural remedies that are great for dog training, helping resolve unwanted behaviours such as aggression, separation anxiety, incessant barking and pulling on the lead. Dog training becomes much easier when you have a calm and healthy dog, particularly when the cause of unwanted behaviours can be narrowed down to a dog feeling unwell.

In this free course, you'll discover which herbs, homoeopathic remedies, aromatherapy oils and Bach Flowers have miraculous healing effects on many different disorders and unwanted manners. Sharon, your tutor, explains which herbs work wonders with specific health complaints and behaviours in dogs and where you can get them at an excellent price. She also talks about homoeopathic remedies, highlighting which ones are good for dealing with particular ailments and behaviours. You'll be surprised just how simple it can be. Research aromatherapy and Bach Flowers and how they can heal and balance your dog's demeanour. Learn simple strategies so your dog recovers quickly, their ailments disappear and Nature does what is intended. Sharon will share the natural product she used that prevented her dog from having an operation when his kneecap 'popped out', despite those in authority telling her the only answer was to operate. Using this product, he healed beautifully without surgery.

Additionally, Sharon shows you how to create a natural first aid kit, especially for your pets. This uncomplicated yet highly effective kit could be a lifesaver when ailments arise or in an emergency. By the end of this course, you'll know how to heal your dog using natural remedies, what to use and where to get them. You'll have the knowledge and confidence to help your dog in a way that promotes optimum health and saves you a fortune. You'll also know how to use natural remedies in your dog training programme. So if your dog has recurring illnesses or you are concerned about their health, vitality and unwanted dog behaviours, this course is for you! Imagine your dog with a shiny coat, bright shiny eyes and vibrant health. It's never too early or too late to use natural remedies for your dog. So register today!
